lead_paragraph: Belgian authorities have released a man, previously convicted on terror-related charges, who was stopped while speeding through the center of Brussels with a van loaded with two gas canisters.
snippet: Belgian authorities have released a man, previously convicted on terror-related charges, who was stopped while speeding through the center of Brussels with a van loaded with two gas canisters....

headline.main: PETA Condemns N.H.L.’s Use of Real Penguins in Pittsburgh Pregame Show
headline.print_headline: Activists Condemn the Use of Live Penguins
